meanings.definition: The act of drowning people, especially as a form of execution.
meanings.sent1: The noyades of prisoners in the ancient times were cruel and heartless.
meanings.sent2: The noyades of innocent civilians during the war were tragic and devastating.
meanings.sent3: The noyades of the cartoon characters in the movie made the audience gasp in shock.
meanings.sent4: The noyades of hopes and dreams in the harsh reality of life can be overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The vivid description of the noyades in the history book left a lasting impression on the students.
